tagline.en: Leading service provider of game engine, development tools and software.
tagline.cn: 行业领先的游戏引擎、开发工具及软件服务商。

introduce.en: The EOSCocos core team members are active entrepreneurs with domain knowledge in gaming, game engine and IDE, developer community, financial market mechanism, macroeconomics and financial asset pricing. They are capable of establishing ecosystem-level business based on their vision, execution capability and resources obtained from the last two economic cycles.
introduce.cn: EOSCocos核心团队成员是具有游戏、游戏引擎和IDE、开发人员社区、金融市场机制、宏观经济学和金融资产定价领域知识的活跃创业者。他们有能力根据他们在过去两个经济周期中获得的愿景，执行能力和资源建立生态系统级业务。
